title: At Close Range (1986) Sean Penn + Christopher Walken (opt.subs)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0090670/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0090670/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files with green color: French, Spanish (Work in Windows Media Player etc.)

With Chris Penn and Mary Stuart Masterson

A very young Sean Penn (then 26) stars with his younger brother Chris, who died in 2006, in this classic where the two brothers try to cope with their criminal father (Christopher Walken).
I just discovered that this film has vanished from all the torrent sites, so I made a new rip for you. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x288, good stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
